Package ch.phonon.temview

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TEMAdapter
    This is the central adapter listened by the TEMView to handle TEMView specific keyboard and mouse events.
    TemAdapterScaleTreatment
    This class handles the DrawableScaleReference movement in the TEMView based on the mouse input from the user.
    TEMEditMode
    The TEMEditMode class is used by the TEMView to obtain updated components as e.g.
    TEMInspectionPanel
    This JPanel contains all components necessary to inspect TEM pictures: The components included are a TEMView, that shows the loaded active TEMAllied, a TEMStatusBar, that shows important information e.g as the actual mouse cursor position, buttons to switch between different TEMAllieds and buttons to switch between different TEMEditTypes that are managed by the TEMEditMode class.
    TEMStatusBar
    The TEMStatusBar informs the user about aspects seen in the TEMView as e.g.
    TEMView
    The TEMView is a JPanel, that is used to show various Drawable objects.
    TEMViewState
    The TEMViewState class represents the zooming, scaling and panning state of the TEMView.
    TEMViewStateTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TEMEditType
    The TEMEditType classifies different modes of the TEMView.
